resources.string:
Our Project: 
 Our team is David Jia, Coleman Johnston and Joakim Johansen. We built this app using Android SDK and Firebase API to store in a database. We use the Yelp Fusion API to get information about different restaurants and the Firebase Facebook API to get the log in. 
 
 Deliverables:
 We aim to build an Android application that assists users in finding a restaurant to eat at by providing an interface similar to tinder. The app will show the user pictures of food then supply matches based on the dishes that the user approved of. Essentially we hope to provide a tinder for that matches people with restaurant instead of other people. 
 
 Motivation: 
 It can be exceptionally difficult to decide on a place to eat especially if one does not have a specific craving at the time, and Yelp only provides filters so it cannot choose a restaurant for you.
